title: A novel porous interbody fusion cage modified by microarc oxidation and hydrothermal treatment technology accelerate osseointegration and spinal fusion in sheep
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31966-31978
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08185K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiang Sun, Shan-Shan Liu, Da Zou, Ren-Hua Ni, Chong-Bin Wei, Hao Wang, Wei-Shi Li
A bioactive CaP coating with micro/nano multilevel morphology for 3D printed Ti6Al4V cage significantly reduced the incidence of fusion failure during the early postoperative. A sheep ACDF model has high reference value for clinical practice.
